HomePagePart1: This application will help you to memorize and do not skip important events which you perform periodically.
HomePagePart2: You see only days and events you have. All the information in one list.
You don't need to search calendar to find your event walking by months.
TasksListEmpty: Schedule your activities. To save your first record you need to make up a name and
set time it has to be repeated (once, daily, monthly, ets).
